author: Special Correspondent
text:
The official machinery has completed the arrangements for the pulse polio vaccination drive targeting children in the age group of 0-5 years to be held on Sunday.

In Coimbatore district, 1,337 vaccination centres will come up in rural areas and 244 in urban areas for immunising as many as 3.38 lakh children.

Migrant workers

Arrangements are also in place to vaccinate 1,469 children of migrant workers.

As many as 2,832 staff members have been roped in for the exercise.

Thirty nine centres would function in places of public congregation such as bus stands, railway station, shopping areas and temples.

This will be in addition to the 27 mobile vaccination units, officials said.

The Nilgiris

In the Nilgiris, 770 vaccination centres will be established in various parts of the district. This includes 29 in temples, 52 in churches and six in mosques.
title: Arrangements in place for immunisation drive
